title: Consumed
description: Consume, verb 1. To destroy (something) or expend by use; use up 2. To destroy by burning (something) 3. To absorb; engross 4. To undergo destruction  Courtney is a curvy, feisty bombshell who has watched her friends be swept off their feet by the alpha men of the Devil Chasers’ Motorcycle Club. She thinks she has met her match when she falls for one of the MC bad boys, but a vindictive act against the Devil Chasers will change her forever.  After surviving a horrific accident, Courtney is badly shaken by the uncertainty of her life. Her doubts and fears rise to the surface as she reevaluates everything she holds dear.  Bobby is the brains behind the Devil Chasers’ Motorcycle Club, a computer whiz who keeps his club a step ahead of the rest. The club is his family, and he would protect them at any cost. His undeniable attraction to Courtney brings her closer to them than he’s ever let anyone come.  But when a rival club puts her in danger, Bobby’s world is rocked to its core. He is pushed to his breaking point, as he tries to restrain the chaos inside him and solidify his love.  Bobby’s obsession with revenge must be controlled before everything he knows is consumed in its wake. ***Warning- Consumed is book four in the Devil Chaser’s MC Romance series. It is a standalone romance and can be read without reading the other books in the series. This book is intended for readers 18 years old or older due to the explicit language, sexual situations, and violence that may be upsetting to some readers.
author: L. Wilder
